footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Playstyle: Yun Jin

description:
**Normal Attack Support**
Yun Jin excels at this sort of playstyle. Because she provides considerable Bonus Flat DMG to Normal Attacks, she is a viable option for most characters, particularly those whose playstyles focus upon their Normal Attacks.

Yun Jin will switch in to cast her Elemental Skill and Burst, then shift out quickly, generally to the on-field DPS, in this playstyle. Skill -> Burst in that order is typically preferable since it allows her to collect the Particles created by her Skill.

**On-Field Physical DPS**
Yun Jin's Normal Attacks aren't very noteworthy: her scalings are quite weak, and she lacks any substantial attack speed, leaving her outclassed as an on-field NA-using DPS.

Yun Jin, on the other hand, being a Polearm user, gets access to Crescent Pike, one of the finest Physical DPS weapons in the game. When used as an on-field DPS, she uses her Elemental Burst with Pike to increase the damage of her Normal Attack. It is recommended to have a team that allows Superconduct.
title: Yun Jin | Playstyle
